item.title: Thune says he's "optimistic" about ending government shutdown this week
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune said he's "optimistic" about ending the government shutdown this week. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Diane Ladd, Oscar-nominated actress and mother of Laura Dern, dies at 89
item.description: Diane Ladd, the actor known for her Oscar-nominated roles in "Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore," "Wild at Heart," and "Rambling Rose" has died.

item.title: Obama stops short of endorsing Zohran Mamdani as New York City mayoral race winds down
item.description: Former President Barack Obama has praised Zohran Mamdani's campaign for New York City mayor, but he's stopped short of endorsing him. CBS News politic...

item.title: How much does a $75,000 home equity loan cost monthly following the Fed's October rate cut?
item.description: Need to borrow $75,000? Here's how much a home equity loan of this size will cost after the October Fed rate cut.
